channel.title: Infromation on AS204994
channel.description: Recent content in Infromation on AS204994

item.title: Quick Overview of the network
item.description: AS204994 spans 5 countries (Ireland, UK, Germany, Amsterdam and USA), with 5 servers from 4 providers (3 from Vultr, 1 from VServer.site and 1 from Packet.Net) and some on-prem machines (mix of VMs and Physical routers and machines). this may change over time, so check the homepage Upstream providers are listed on the homepage also, but in house I use Virgin Media Business broadband and from there tunnel back to the upstream servers using ZeroTier.
